glsa.title: ConnMan: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ConnMan, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.

background.p: ConnMan provides a daemon for managing Internet connections.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ConnMan:

ul.li: Errors in inet.c and rtnl.c prevent ConnMan from checking the origin of netlink messages (CVE-2012-2320).
ConnMan does not properly check for shell escapes when requesting a hostname via DHCP (CVE-2012-2321).
An infinite loop error exists in client.c (CVE-2012-2322).

impact.p: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
